descriptionHtml:
I see alot of ppl putting up good mods,and quality ones.I decided I\'d try my hand at it.I didn\'t make this for super ultra quality.It just replaces the original with a better one for low to midrange users.The texture is 1024x1024,so no different in size than original.It matches the land nicely,and looks similar to what the stones in the walls are made with.Also,both textures are actually the same,but since there\'s 2 textures I might as well put them so people don\'t wonder why only part of the mountin is textured with it.

If you want to make the mountains use the original textures but look better,just use the original textures and maps,and tile them 2x2,so they are 2048x2048.That seems to make a huge difference.Since I don\'t have permissions on original texture,and don\'t wanna wait,I\'m putting this one I made for now.I hope someone uses and likes it,or understands what I said about tiling. :)

Update:
I put a test 2048x2048 texture for those that want higher res.It will cause lower FPS,but prob not much.Like I said it\'s a test,I don\'t notice much diff in fps on my GTX650.

To install:
Unrar and put the landscape folder in your texture folder,overwrite if needed.
Please backup your old files first before replacing.

To uninstall:
Just delete the mountainslab01.dds and mountainslab02.dds files

Remember,if oyu have a mod or replacer that changes these files,it will overwrite them,so backup old ones first.
author: Belial666
